__e: Look, what I remember is being in law school and being engaged to Jeremy.
He was very proud of the fact that I went to law school, and I started practicing law.
He expressed an intention of studying the law. I wished, rather than believed him to be sincere.
I didn't spend eight years in the can studying' law for nothin'.
We went to law school for two-and-a-half years, right?
In a courtroom, like a real lawyer.
